prompts.prompt:
User:

###
{userMessage}
###

Assistant:

###
{assistantMessage}
###

Analyze the above conversation history very well. Come up with a name for this conversation. Max 3-6 words. The name should be in the conversartion locale. Answer with the name of the conversation only. Don't include quotes.

template.name: conversation-name
template.description: Generate a name for the conversation

prompts.prompt: You are an AI chatbot. Write a very short, friendly, and slightly creative welcome message for the user named {userName}, suitable for a chat interface. Keep it between 3 and 7 words. Messages could mention their first name, but messages without the name are fine. Try to vary the wording, tone, or mood each time—be upbeat, curious, or playful. For example: 'How can I help, {userName}?', 'What’s up, {userName}?', 'Hey {userName}, need a hand?', 'Ready when you are, {userName}!', 'Hi {userName}, what’s your question?', or 'Let’s get started, {userName}!'. Only output the welcome message itself, no quotes or extra text.

template.name: welcome-message
template.description: Generate a concise, friendly chatbot welcome message mentioning the user by name.
